componentAttributes.richTextValue:
Announcements (Updated Q4 2024)

Customer Pipeline Health and Visibility

Effective opportunity and pipeline management is critical in understanding the health of our global business. Through continued training with our PAMs and Sales teams, we shared Global guidance, tools & resources, and best practices aligned to our sales process, equipping you to manage and grow your business most effectively. Sales team members can access the following dashboards to help evaluate the size, quality and velocity of their team’s pipeline, and determine what specific actions are required to surpass sales objectives.

YTD Pipeline Stats

Sales Cockpit

Onboarding & Continued Learning

As part of our improvement initiatives, we have updated the Territory Planning video link in the Manager and Sales job category curriculums. We added a link to the Channel Partner Program Hub and Market Players / Market Intelligence Resources page.

Go-to-Market Offerings 

Certified Pre-Owned (CPO) Offering: The CPO offering provides a way for budget constrained customers (in strategic deals) to purchase an instrument where a new instrument would otherwise not be purchased. PAM approval required prior to speaking to end-customers about this offering. 

Updates to ICPP Opportunity Record, Go-to-Market Offerings header and fields: Don’t forget to flag opportunities when a Go-to-Market Offering is used to win business, see the updated video on how-to flag an opportunity. 

 List of Go-to-Market Offerings updated under the ‘Additional Opportunity Information’ within Opportunity record include: 

  • Marketing Central
  • Demo 
  • New to NGS Training
  • Certified Pre-Owned (CPO)

Commercial Processes & Systems

Revamped and Tailored Commercial Systems Training:

An updated ICPP Overview and Sales Capabilities training video is now live! This comprehensive video guides users through key sales feature, ensuring a deeper understanding of Salesforce. Access it easy via the website banner carousel or via the link below.

Illumina Channel Partner Program Sales Training for ICPP

Be sure to also check out the updated ICPP Help Page with an updated list of helpful FAQ documents and user guides. Find resources such as a guide on safelisting email addresses and website URLs to ensure uninterrupted communication.

*NEW* Voice-enabled Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) option on Okta

A new option to implement voice call MFA for our Channel Partner organizations has been made available in Okta.  

File Sharing between Illumina and Channel Partners:

Illumina has recently migrated to M365 SharePoint as the new platform for external content and file sharing with our Channel Partners. Any files previously shared using the Box application have been migrated now to M365 SharePoint and can be accessed via the link below.

https://ilmn.sharepoint.com/teams/CPLS

For any new files that are shared directly with you as a Channel Partner team member, you will continue to receive email notifications and can access those files directly using the link in the email. Please refer to the training video for a walkthrough of using the M365 SharePoint for access shared files and content.


   

New Product Introductions 

In the second half 2024, the following are the latest innovations brought to market. Review the recorded trainings stored in the product ICE pages under Commercial training recordings. For your future reference, Quarterly NPI Bulletins are housed in Onboarding and Continued Learning. 

   

Product Name 

   		    

Description 

   		    

Regional Availability 

   		    

Audience 

   		    

ICE Page 

   
   

MiSeq i100 Series

   		    

The new standard in benchtop sequencing speed and simplicity

   		    

All 

   		    

All Sales 

   		    

Link 

   

Performance Management  

The Value Tier Program (VTP) scorecard automation is now live! Your PAMs should be receiving a monthly email alert from our systems with your up-to-date performance metrics. Please ask your PAM for your scorecard if you have any questions.  

Your Pams will have quarterly automated reports sent to them with customer feedback from the Illumina relationship survey. Customers provide both quantitative and qualitative feedback specific to your organization. Ask your PAM about including these data points during your next QBRs.

Based on your feedback, the Training Completion KPI now only considers ‘overdue’ trainings in the numerator vs. ‘assigned and overdue’. You should see higher performance for this KPI if your organization does not have numerous overdue trainings.  

Lastly, in the View Data tab within the VTP Dashboard, your PAMs can now share progress against your Annual Sales Target on a quarterly basis. 

For any general questions, please refer to the Value Tier Program page.

公告（2024年第四季度更新）

有效业务机会和预期销量管理对于了解我们全球业务的状况来说是至关重要的。在本年度的培训课程中，我们将分享与销售流程相关的全球指导、工具、资源以及最佳实践，使您能更有效地管理和发展业务。销售团队成员可以访问下方的商业智能仪表盘（dashboard），帮助您评估团队预期销量的规模、质量和速度，并确定采取怎样的具体措施来实现销售目标。

YTD预计销量统计

Sales Cockpit

新经销商到岗与持续学习

作为我们改进举措的一部分，我们在角色类别为Manager和Sales的人员课程中，更新了区域计划视频链接。我们在课程中增加了一个链接，点击可进入渠道合作伙伴计划中心和市场参与者/市场情报资源页面。

商业流程与系统

修改和定制商业系统培训：

ICPP概览和销售能力培训的更新视频已经上线！这个全面的视频指导用户了解Salesforce的关键销售功能，通过网站横幅广告或下方链接访问。

Illumina渠道合作伙伴计划（ICPP）销售培训

请务必查看更新的 ICPP 帮助页面，其中包含有用的常见问题解答文档和用户指南的更新列表。 查找诸如安全电子邮件地址和网站网址指南等资源，以确保与因美纳之间通畅的通信联系。

Okta新增支持语音身份验证功能:

Okta软件为我们的渠道合作伙伴组织提供了实施语音呼叫MFA身份验证的新选项。

Illumina与渠道合作伙伴之间的文件共享： 

Illumina最近将M365 SharePoint应用为我们与渠道合作伙伴进行外部内容和文件共享的新平台。之前使用Box应用程序共享的所有文件，现在已迁移到M365 SharePoint，并可以通过下方的链接进行访问。

https://ilmn.sharepoint.com/teams/CPLS

作为渠道合作伙伴成员，对于与您直接共享的所有新文件，您将继续收到电子邮件通知，并可以使用电子邮件中的链接直接访问这些文件。请参考培训视频，了解如何使用M365 SharePoint来访问共享文件和内容。

新产品介绍

在上个季度，以下是推向市场的最新创新产品。请查看在ICE产品页面下的商业培训记录。供您日后参考，季度NPI公告存放在新经销商到岗与持续学习中。

 

Product Name 

Description 

Regional Availability 

Audience 

ICE Page 

MiSeq i100 Series

The new standard in benchtop sequencing speed and simplicity

All 

All Sales 

Link 


绩效管理

Value Tier Program（VTP）自动化评分卡已经上线！您的渠道客户经理（PAM）应该会每月收到我们系统的电子邮件提醒，其中包含您最新的绩效指标。如果您有任何问题，请向您的PAM询问您的评分卡详情。

PAM现在将定期收到来自客户反馈的Illumina问卷调查的自动化报告。客户提供与您的组织相关的定量和定性反馈。在下一个季度业务评审（QBR）期间，向您的PAM询问是否包括这些数据点。

根据您的反馈，关于完成培训的KPI绩效指标，现在仅考虑“逾期”的培训项目数量作为分子，而不是“已分配和逾期”的培训项目数量。如果您的组织没有大量逾期的培训项目，您应该会看到更高的KPI绩效指标。

最后，在VTP仪表板的“查看数据”选项卡中， PAM现在可以每季度与您分享，年度绩效指标达成的进展情况。

如有任何问题，请参考Value Tier Program页面。
